topic.title: Objective

body.p: The objective of this Standard is to prescribe the minimum content of an interim financial report and to prescribe the principles for recognition and measurement in complete or condensed financial statements for an interim period. Timely and reliable interim financial reporting improves the ability of investors, creditors, and others to understand an entityâ€™s capacity to generate earnings and cash flows and its financial condition and liquidity.
